name: simple-color-converter
description: This is a simple colors converter, works for almost any color. Has a built in color identifier for convertin strings to color. Supported convert colors: from and to CMYK, grayscale, hex3, hex4, hex6, hex8, html, hsl, hsv, lab, pantone, ral, rgb, rgba, rgba decimal, wavelength, xyz, yuv.
author: Radu Dragan <draganaurelradu@gmail.com>
